name: Chelsea Brewing Company
description: Chelsea Brewing Company, rated the best brewery in New York, is a first class waterfront restaurant and the only micro-brewery in Manhattan located at pier 59.With over 15 years of experience, and 8 National Awards, we are proud to serve up to 27 natural hand-crafted ales and specialty beers using only the finest malts and hops from around the world. We offer beer tastings, brewery tours and group packages.
